title: monitor out of range !!
body:
since patch 7.1 came out i couldn't play a single game
t tried to re-installing the game , re-installing windows  and tried that alt+enter shortcut
i also tried changing game resolution from outside the game but when i edit game.cfg file only this pops to me:

[General]
SystemMouseSpeed=10
CfgVersion=7.1.7278

 pls help me i couldn't find a solution for this issue

replies.body:
I found the solution in a video a guy posted on youtube.

He wrote two scripts that will fix your out of range problems in no time.

i was playing lol in window mode for more than a year now and nothing helped me except his scripts.

Donated that guy a few dollars for his efforts.


https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Xvs8sDnjBq4

Hmm... That's pretty weird! It's possible your configuration file is screwed up. I'd like you to complete a quick reset of this file by deleting the entire folder this file resides in (Config Folder) while you're logged into the client and have it running in the background. Afterwards, you'll want to try hopping in a custom match alone so you can confirm whether the reset worked or not.

Please let me know if this fixed your problem.

:'( I can not play the league...

It is the sad time

Upon load screen, frequency out of range is displayed. I alt tab to desktop and close window. Not using my usual hdmi... It's the old one, what ever that is

Gotcha. Have you also tried hitting **ALT+ENTER** when you see this issue pop up? If so, then I recommend reaching out in a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and attaching some system logs with our [**HRT App.**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367)

Let me know if you have any other questions.

MY friend targons blade i have the SAME PROBLEM like the guy above.
EXACT the same. i already tried all possible solutions but i CANT FIX it. PLZ HELP
